section.p:
First person –
An abair mi sin ri Calum? Abraidh, ach chan abair thu e ri Iain.
Shall I say that to Calum? Yes, but you will not say it to John. td. 177

Second person –
Abair ri Iain gu faic mi e am màireach.
Tell John that I will see him tomorrow. td. 177

Third person –
An dubhairt iad gu robh iad a’ tighinn dhachaidh an nochd? Thubhairt.
Did they say that they were coming home tonight? Yes, they did. td. 177
Their iad gu bheil iad sgìth.
They will say that they are tired. td. 177
Cha dubhairt e facal rium.
He didn’t say a word to me. td. 177
